plot outline: Ziprya belongs to a boot-polish gang in Mumbai who work all around the city at prime locations.He isn't happy with their leader Pinglya who does not treat them well, Pinglya dies in a train crash and Ziprya becomes the new leader elected by Aslam,Narya and Taklya.Ziprya is complete opposite of Pinglya he is kind and generous and wants the kids in their gang to get proper education.
title: Ziprya
plot: Story revolves around protagonist _Ziprya_ (qv), a 16 year old shoe shine boy in Mumbai local trains who wants to survive the dark present and make brighter future for him along with his Friends & Family.

_Ziprya_ (qv) belongs to a boot-polish gang in Mumbai who work all around the city at prime locations.He isn't happy with their leader Pinglya who does not treat them well, Pinglya dies in a train crash and _Ziprya_ (qv) becomes the new leader elected by Aslam,Narya and Taklya._Ziprya_ (qv) is complete opposite of Pinglya he is kind and generous and wants the kids in their gang to get proper education.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
